title: TPACK and Constructivist Learning Competency Workshop in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Online real-time workshops for in-service secondary mathematics teachers, conducted in corporate teacher training programs. Focuses on enhancing digital tool utilization and constructivist learning design competencies in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Participants can explain the TPACK framework for designing mathematics lessons based on constructivist principles, linked to at least three technology tools.
Participants can create learner-centered mathematics inquiry activity designs using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Jamboard).
Participants can provide at least two types of feedback on peers' lesson designs according to formative assessment criteria.

resources: TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) Assessment Rubric

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
